title: Nintendo Direct August 2024 Kinda Funny LIVE Reaction
description:
Head over to Patreon.com/KindaFunny for daily exclusive content!

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny

Follow The Kinda Funny Team:
